title: Republican-led Texas House impeaches state Attorney General Ken Paxton
description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton has been impeached by fellow Republicans in a historic vote in the Texas House. He will immediately and temporarily be suspended from his duties.

title: 2 more Oath Keepers are sentenced to prison terms for the Jan. 6 Capitol attack
description: A federal judge sentenced Army veterans Jessica Watkins, of Woodstock, Ohio, to more than eight years in prison and Kenneth Harrelson, of Titusville, Fla., to four years in the 2021 riot.

title: Local farmers in South Africa were cut out of rooibos tea cash. Now change is brewing
description: For generations, the Khoisan people harvested the rooibos plant to make tea. As this caffeine-free drink has grown trendy — 9,000 tons exported a year — they've been cut out of revenues. Until now.

title: Fixit culture is on the rise... but repair legislation faces resistance
description: U.S. consumers are showing an increased interest in prolonging the life of the things they own, rather than throwing them out. But some products are easier to fix than others.

title: Turkey's runoff election will decide if Erdogan extends his 20-year rule
description: After an inconclusive round one, Sunday's vote should decide whether citizens still want President Recep Tayyip Erdogan in charge for another five-year term, and he could have an edge to win.

title: Creating a sperm or egg from any cell? Reproduction revolution on the horizon
description: Researchers are inching closer to creating human eggs and sperm in the lab that carry a full complement of anyone's DNA. It could revolutionize fertility treatment and raises huge ethical questions.

title: A service dog gets his own college diploma, winning huge cheers
description: When Grace Mariani graduated from Seton Hall University this week, the school president had a special gift for Justin, her service dog.

title: Trailing Trump, DeSantis still bears burdens that have brought down past front-runners
description: Being clearly the party's Plan B right now has a downside for DeSantis because it makes him Target A for Trump and for all the other candidates.

title: The Texas AG may be impeached by members of his own party. Here are the allegations
description: Saturday, the Texas House will vote on whether to impeach state Attorney General Ken Paxton who investigators say allegedly abused his office to help a campaign donor by committing bribery and more.
